sentences.en: Mountain mainly by rhyolite and tuff composition, there are local granite.
sentences.cn: 山体主要由流纹岩和凝灰岩构成, 局部有花岗岩.

sentences.en: People come to this area in order to see the colorful rhyolite mountains.
sentences.cn: 人们来到这个地区是为了观看那里五彩缤纷的流纹岩山脉。

sentences.en: The Cretaceous rhyolite - porphyry is the main parent rock Of the deposit , extending inNE - orientation.
sentences.cn: 白垩纪流纹斑岩为其主要的成矿母岩,可能为 NE 向展布.

sentences.en: The extrusive equivalent of granite is rhyolite.
sentences.cn: 而流纹岩则是与花岗岩成分相同的酸性喷出岩.

sentences.en: The features and the development law of rhyolite landforms are unique.
sentences.cn: 流纹岩地貌有其独有的特色和发育规律.

sentences.en: The ore bodies are confined to Yanshanian metamorphosed rhyolite porphyry and felsite.
sentences.cn: 矿体赋存在燕山期变质流纹斑岩、霏细岩中.

sentences.en: The pyroclastic rock fragments comprise quartzite, schist, gneiss, basalt , andesite, rhyolite and quartz.
sentences.cn: 火成岩的碎块成分主要为石英岩 、 岩 、 麻岩 、 武岩 、 山岩和流纹岩.

sentences.en: The rock assemblages of the Bayinbuluke formation are mainly alkaline basalt - thick andesite - alkaline rhyolite.
sentences.cn: 火山岩岩石组合以碱性玄武岩 - 粗安岩 - 碱性流纹岩为主.

sentences.en: The violent and unexpected nature of the blasts, together with their rarity, means the Chaiteneruption is the first rhyolite event to have been scientifically assessed in this way [ABC News].
sentences.cn: 其猛烈及难以预料的自然爆发，及它们的罕见程度,  意味着Chaiten火山爆发已经被这样合乎逻辑地评估为第一个流纹岩活动 [美国广播公司消息]。

sentences.en: Topaz occurs in the igneous rock rhyolite.
sentences.cn: 黄晶通常产于火成岩岩石纹。

words.tran_cn: [岩]流纹岩；表面光滑的火山岩

trans.tran_en: a fine-grained igneous rock consisting of quartz, feldspars, and mica or amphibole
